test_rhythmdetectors module¶

test_rhythmdetectors.get_test_hr1(a=60, b=60, c=60)¶
test_rhythmdetectors.get_test_hr1()

Create test dataframe.

test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_brady()¶
test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_brady()

Test output of bradydetector when threshold is set to 50.

test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_brady2()¶
test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_brady2()

Test bradydetector when threshold is set to 100.

test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_brady3()¶
test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_brady3()

Test bradydetector when threshold is set to 0.

test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_bradytachy()¶
test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_bradytachy()

Test output of tachy/bradydetector when brady threshold is set to 50 and tachy to 100.

test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_tachy()¶
test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_tachy()

Test output of tachydetector when threshold is set to 140.

test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_tachy2()¶
test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_tachy2()

Test tachydetector when threshold is set to 1000.

test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_tachy3()¶
test_rhythmdetectors.test_detect_rhythm_tachy3()

Test tachydetector when threshold is set to 0.
